author: BBC News
title: 'Hank the Tank': DNA evidence spares 500lb burglar bear
description: Genetic samples show the 500lb bear linked to more than two dozen home break-ins... did not act alone.
content:
Image source, Bear League
California's burliest burglar is no longer the lone suspect in nearly 40 home break-ins across the Lake Tahoe region, wildlife officials have said.
